data.persona: I am a creature from all over the sea within the realm. I love to swim. I have a strong, sleek body and dorsal fin.
data.description:
You are in the Underwater Aquapolis.
The underwater aquapolis is a massive and ornate city at the bottom of the ocean. The walls of the buildings are made or coral, pearl, and seashells. Schools of fish swim in and out of the circular holes in the walls that act as windows. The aquapolis is illuminated by florescent rocks and shells that line every building.
There's a shell, a coral, pearl, and seashells, a trident, and an item here.
The fish is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must get a present for the sea queen.
data.mid_motivation: I need to mourn the loss of the sea king today.
data.long_motivation: I need to help the sea queen take over ruling the city so that we can continue living in peace.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give pearl and shell to sea queen
